name: 研究方法與論文寫作
goals: 培養學生撰寫與發表英文學術論文之能力
培養學生透過適當研究方法解決、分析與批判研究問題之智能
syllabus:
**\[For** **students of LINGUISTICS****\]** **這堂課是針對英語系語言組研究生的論文寫作課，因此課上講授內容與範例、要求同學課堂報告的論文及寫作作業都是以語言學(非語言教學)為基礎。**
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tentative Schedule

Week 1  Orientation  
Week 2  How to reference/search for references  
Week 3  An Approach to Academic Writing: general guidelines  
Week 4  An Approach to Academic Writing: general guidelines  
Week 5  Writing General-Specific Text  
Week 6  Writing Summaries  
Week 7  Writing Critiques  
Week 8  Writing Data commentary  
Week 9  Problem, Process and Solution  
Week 10 Titles & Abstracts  
Week 11 Introduction  
Week 12  Method  
Week 13  Results and Discussion  
Week 14  Group reports  
Week 15  Handouts & Presentations  
Week 16  Presentation of individual term reports
prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
